articles.author: Katie England Daily Herald
articles.title: Man suspected of killing Tooele teens appears in court, families support death penalty
articles.description: The man arrested for reportedly killing two Tooele teens and dumping their bodies down a remote mine shaft near Eureka could face the death penalty if convicted of the charges being pursued.

articles.author: Katie England Daily Herald
articles.title: Eureka man reportedly killed two missing teens likely found dead in mine shaft
articles.description: One man has been arrested by the Utah County Sheriff's Office in the case of two missing teens from Tooele for allegedly murdering them out of jealousy that his girlfriend had a male visitor in their house.

articles.author: Jennifer Weaver
articles.title: Polygamous leader Lyle Jeffs sentenced to nearly 5 years in prison - KUTV 2News
articles.description: KUTV 2News Polygamous leader Lyle Jeffs sentenced to nearly 5 years in prison KUTV 2News FILE - This photograph provided by the Tooele County Sheriff's Office shows Lyle Jeffs. Jeffs ran day-to-day operations for the Fundamentalist Church of Jesus Christ of L…

articles.author: Katie England Daily Herald
articles.title: Bodies found in Eureka mine identified as those of missing teens
articles.description: The two bodies removed Wednesday from a mine in a remote location on the Utah and Juab counties' borders have been identified by as those of missing teens, Breezy Otteson and Riley Powell.

articles.author: Karissa Neely Daily Herald
articles.title: Families of two teens likely found dead near Eureka speak out after arrest
articles.description: Family members of Breezy Otteson and Riley Powell, the two teens whose bodies investigators believe they found Wednesday, addressed the media Thursday afternoon in Spanish Fork.

articles.author: Katie England Daily Herald
articles.title: Girlfriend of man charged with killing teens now charged in court with obstructing justice
articles.description: Charges have been filed in Utah's Fourth District Court against Morgan Henderson, the girlfriend of the man charged with murder for reportedly stabbing two teens to death and throwing their bodies down an abandoned mine shaft.

articles.author: Katie England Daily Herald
articles.title: Woman charged with obstructing justice in case of slain Eureka teens makes first court appearance
articles.description: Charges have been filed in Utah's Fourth District Court against Morgan Henderson, the girlfriend of the man charged with murder for reportedly stabbing two teens to death and throwing their bodies down an abandoned mine shaft.

articles.author: Karissa Neely Daily Herald
articles.title: Hearing for man charged with killing two Eureka teens continued until August
articles.description: A Eureka man's waiver hearing was continued Thursday morning until Aug. 1.

articles.author: http://www.dailymail.co.uk/home/search.html?s=&authornamef=Germania+Rodriguez+For+Dailymail.com, By Germania Rodriguez For Dailymail.com and Associated Press
articles.title: Utah teen couple who were thrown down a mine are laid to rest in first of two joint funeral services
articles.description: Brelynne Otteson, 17, and Riley Powell, 18, who disappeared last December and were found dead at the bottom of a mine shaft in Utah's West Desert were laid to rest on Saturday in Eureka.

articles.title: Serial Killer Ted Bundy Is Executed (1989)
articles.description: In December 1977, Ted Bundy escaped from jail in Colorado—for the second time—and fled to Florida. There, he resumed a streak of murders that he had begun in 1974, killing 12-year-old Kimberly Leach, among others. He was soon re-arrested, convicted of several…
